summary: Diff adds some Hatem23-specific frontend labeling/config (HTML title, Vite env file, appConfig) and introduces a backend migration that appears to remove the stored owner password. However, the diff does not provide concrete project/canister-level cloning/separation changes needed to guarantee a brand-new, separately accessible deployment with independent state; it mostly documents/assumes that separation will be done during deployment.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create a brand-new, separate application deployment (new project/canister/domain) named "Hatem23" by cloning/copying the entire current resume-site project so that the new deployment has the same functionality, UI, and backend behavior as the existing app.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows in-repo configuration for a Hatem23 build (env vars and title), but does not show any project-level/canister-level cloning or deployment configuration changes that would create a separate deployment/domain/canister while keeping the original app unchanged.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the "Hatem23" deployment has independent backend state from the original app (no shared persisted data).
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence in the diff that a separate backend canister is actually created/configured; the README states it "should" be separate but does not implement separation. Code changes shown do not establish distinct canister IDs or a separate dfx/canister configuration for Hatem23.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend upgrade migration that drops/removes the owner password from persisted state ("Only drop the password" / "New actor has no password").
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly says not to change owner password behavior as part of cloning; removing password state is a functional change beyond labeling/metadata.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced deployment-time configuration for owner name (VITE_OWNER_NAME) in addition to app name/title.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-37 asks to update visible app labeling/metadata to "Hatem23" (e.g., HTML title). Adding configurable owner-name behavior is not requested as part of cloning/metadata labeling.

hallucinated_features.description: Secret message hooks explicitly disabled with placeholder behavior and errors indicating the feature is unavailable.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is about cloning into a separate deployment while keeping existing functionality the same; adding/altering secret-message behavior is unrelated to the cloning requirements.
